description:
Ease your stress: place colorful shapes and enjoy beautiful images. Take your time, breathe and relax.

In the game you will find:

• 200 low poly illustrations to fill: cute animals, amazing nature, harmonious origami and many more
• solo mode with hours of soothing gameplay
• up to 4 players local co-op mode
• a simple and enjoyable way to reduce anxiety and train mindfulness

Discover your inner artist by playing Calm Colors.
name: Calm Colors
